Plot: An elderly and retired police detective and a young amateur sleuth team up to find a serial killer whom has resumed a killing spree in Turin, Italy after a 17-year hiatus.
Title: Sleepless
Writer: Dario Argento (screenplay), Franco Ferrini (screenplay), Carlo Lucarelli (collaborating writer), Dario Argento (story), Franco Ferrini (story)
Actors: Max von Sydow, Stefano Dionisi, Chiara Caselli, Gabriele Lavia
